definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Yin1 yue4 Xue2 yuan4
Zhong1 yang1 Yin1 yue4 Xue2 yuan4
Huan2 qiu2 Yin1 yue4 Ji2 tuan2

sentences.english: Dvorak was interested in the folk music of both Europe and North America.
sentences.chinese: 德沃夏克對歐洲和北美洲的民間音樂很有興趣。

sentences.english: What does pop music do for us that's very helpful?
sentences.chinese: 就這點而言流行音樂對我們來說有什麼用處呢？

sentences.english: He is one of the most talented and inventive drummers in modern music.
sentences.chinese: 他是現代音樂界最具天賦和創造力的鼓手之一。

sentences.english: There was a long time when he wrote his own music without saying one word.
sentences.chinese: 有好長一段時間他寫自己的音樂，一聲也不吭。

sentences.english: The music was fine, but the book was very poor.
sentences.chinese: 音樂是出色的，但是唱詞很糟。

sentences.english: It's one of the most haunting and complex sounds in the animal kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 這是動物王國中最爲複雜，最令人難以忘懷的音樂。

sentences.english: There are also the purely personal predilections of each individual musician.
sentences.chinese: 每一個音樂家都有完全個人的偏愛。

sentences.english: But, she's never achieved chart success with her music.
sentences.chinese: 但是她的音樂從沒有成功的進入過排行榜。

sentences.english: He killed off the whole morning by listening to the music.
sentences.chinese: 他通過聽音樂消磨掉了整個上午的時光。

sentences.english: At the activity class, I helped our teacher to make the music.
sentences.chinese: 在活動課上，我幫助我的英語老師剪輯音樂。

sentences.english: They are in the music room .
Music brings my heart fairy air.
The guske music is played on traditional string instrument.
sentences.chinese: 卡搜音樂是在傳統的管絃樂器上彈奏的。

sentences.english: The holy stream of thy music breaks through all stony obstacles and rushes on.
sentences.chinese: 這音樂的聖流沖垮堅固的阻障，奔湧向前。

sentences.english: So dear friends , let's open our hearts and ears to enjoy music .
sentences.chinese: 親愛的朋友，讓我們敞開心靈和張開雙耳去感受音樂。

sentences.english: The boys and girls danced to the disco music.
sentences.chinese: 少男少女們跟着迪斯科音樂跳舞。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
